alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Freestone; Henderson; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 8:27PM CDT until March 16 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Freestone County in central Texas... Henderson County in central Texas... Northwestern Anderson County in central Texas... East central Navarro County in north central Texas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 827 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kerens, or 12 miles south of Gun Barrel City, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Palestine, Athens, Gun Barrel City, Malakoff, Tool, Kerens, Brownsboro, Eustace, Trinidad, Enchanted Oaks, Caney City, Lake Palestine, Forest Grove Reservoir, Montalba, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Coon Creek Lake, Trinidad Lake, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Brushy Creek and Cross Roads. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central and north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
